alert.note: Alert for Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 01 at 8:40PM CST until March 03 at 5:20AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Noxubee River At Macon affecting Noxubee County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Noxubee River At Macon. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Farm land near the river begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 28.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CST Tuesday was 29.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow morning and continue falling to 15.4 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Noxubee River Macon 26.0 28.0 Tue 8 pm CST 25.1 22.1 19.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 845 AM CST.
